A technology-based solution would make veterinary help faster and more accessible for every pet owner.
It can save animal lives by connecting owners with nearby vets or emergency services in real time.
Over time, it would also raise awareness about pet health, encourage preventive care, and build stronger communities around animal welfare.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many pet owners struggle to find quick and reliable medical help when their pets fall sick or face emergencies. Limited access to nearby vets and delayed treatment often put animal lives at risk. There’s a need for a connected platform that ensures timely care and easy access to trusted veterinary support.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: Pet Health and Emergency Support Platform
